room_title: Escape room "Contaminated" by Locked Up - Grand Rapids in Grand Rapids
room_description:
A government subsidized water facility “melts” down releasing a toxin into the water supply. As the toxin spreads to epidemic proportions, our large city is quarantined leaving those stuck on the inside fighting for their lives. Hospitals are overflowing with sick residents from our beautiful city.
In the last and final hour, you and your team have been tasked to find the vaccine that can cure and save the lives of millions. Actions will reveal both the devolution of humanity and the birth of unlikely heroes. Will you and your team become those noted heroes, or perish with the rest?
